Unit1.title: Some Basic Concepts in Chemistry
topics: Concept of atom, molecule, element and compound

Unit2.title: Atomic Structure
topics: Energy of the electron and orbit radii
Quantum mechanical model of the atom
Shapes of s, p, and d orbitals
Electron spin and spin quantum number
Aufbau principle, Pauli's exclusion principle, and Hund's rule

Unit3.title: Chemical Bonding and Molecular Structure
topics: Bond order, bond length, and bond energy

Unit4.title: Chemical Thermodynamics
topics: Concepts of work, heat, internal energy, and enthalpy
Heat capacity and molar heat capacity
Enthalpies of bond dissociation, combustion, formation, and phase transition
Spontaneity of processes and Gibbs free energy

Unit5.title: Solutions
topics: Concentration expressions: molality, molarity, mole fraction, percentage
Colligative properties: vapour pressure lowering, boiling point elevation, freezing point depression, osmotic pressure
Molecular mass determination using colligative properties
Van’t Hoff factor and its significance

Unit6.title: Equilibrium
topics: Equilibrium in physical and chemical processes
Equilibrium constants (Kp, Kc) and their significance
pH scale, common ion effect, buffer solutions
Solubility product and hydrolysis of salts

Unit7.title: Redox Reactions and Electrochemistry
topics: Electrochemical cells: Galvanic and electrolytic cells
Electrode potentials and standard electrode potential
Dry cell, lead accumulator, and fuel cells

Unit8.title: Chemical Kinetics
topics: Reaction rate and factors affecting rate
